text: Yetiya kaphirasakale sihamtara antarata gotraiya ahamika posana karaichilaâ€” ajnata yugara ahamika, tetiya allahe te'omra raachulara arau muminasakalara oparata te'omra prasanti aratirna karaile, arau te'omlokaka takbaraara kalimata sudrrha karaile, te'omloke'i achila iyara adhika yogya arau upayukta; arau allaha sakalo bisaye sarbajna
